name: Aerobic
effect: When attacking with  Wind, gets SPDEF- and SPD +.

name: Air Specialist
effect: +15% damage with  Wind techniques.

name: Amphibian
effect: When attacked with a  Water technique, increases SPD by 1 stage.

name: Anaerobic
effect: When attacking with Toxic, gets SPDEF+ and SPATK-.

name: Apothecary
effect: When attacking with a special technique, the target gets Poisoned  Status condition for 1 turn if it's a rival or Regenerate  Status condition for 1 turn if it's an ally.

name: Avenger
effect: When an ally is knocked-out, increases SPATK and SPD by 1 stage.

name: Benefactor
effect: When an ally is damaged, restores 10% of max HP.

name: Botanist
effect: +15% damage with  Nature techniques.

name: Botanophobia
effect: When attacked with a Nature technique, increases damage by 50%.

name: Brawny
effect: Physical techniques do 20% more damage.

name: Bully
effect: While allies outnumber rivals, techniques inflict +30% damage.

name: Caffeinated
effect: Prevents the Asleep  Status condition.

name: Callosity
effect: When attacked by a physical technique, increases DEF by 1 stage.

name: Camaraderie
effect: When attacked, reduces 50% damage if both allies are part of the same evolutionary line.

name: Channeler
effect: Damage done with Special techniques is increased by 25%.

name: Cold-Natured
effect: Instead of getting  Cold, the Temtem gets  Frozen.

name: Demoralize
effect: When entering the battlefield, decreases enemy team SPD by 1 stage.

name: Determined
effect: Prevents negative stat stage changes.

name: Electric Synthesize
effect: When attacked with an Electric technique, restores HP instead of receiving damage.

name: Energy Reserve
effect: If HP is below 25% by the end of the turn, gets  Vigorized for 2 turns.

name: Fainted Curse
effect: When knocked-out, the attacker loses 40% of max HP.

name: Fast Charge
effect: When a Digital ally enters the battlefield, gets SPD +2.

name: Fever Rush
effect: When getting a Status condition, increases ATK by 1 stage.

name: Flawed Crystal
effect: When attacked by a Mental, Toxic, or Electric Technique, increases damage by 50%.

name: Friendship
effect: Immune to ally's offensive techniques.

name: Furor
effect: When HP is below 33%, techniques do 33% more damage.

name: Guardian
effect: Prevents the   cold,   burned,   poisoned and   doomed Status condition on the ally.

name: Hover
effect: When attacked with an  Earth technique, reduces damage by 50%.

name: Hydrologist
effect: +15% damage with  Water techniques.

name: Immunity
effect: Resists damage from Toxic techniques.

name: Individualist
effect: Techniques targeting the ally will fail.

name: Last Rush
effect: Increases ATK, SPATK and SPD by 50% while being the last standing allied Temtem.

name: Loneliness
effect: Synergies won't work on both allies.

name: Mental Alliance
effect: Increases SPATK by 15% if an ally is  Mental.

name: Mirroring
effect: When attacked with a Special technique, the attacker gets 20% knockback damage.

name: Mithridatism
effect: Prevents the Poisoned  Status condition.

name: Motivator
effect: At the start of the turn, allies restore 10% of STA.

name: Mucous
effect: Resists damage from [[Electric Type|Electric]] techniques and prevents the   cold and  burned Status condition.

name: Neutrality
effect: Prevents all Status Conditions.

name: Parrier
effect: Damage taken from physical techniques is reduced by 30%.

name: Patient
effect: Restores 10% of max STA when using a Hold technique.

name: Plethoric
effect: Temtem has 30% more SPD when HP is full.

name: Power Nap
effect: At the start of the turn, restores 15% of max HP of an Asleep  Temtem.

name: Prideful
effect: When attacking, gets ATK+, SPATK+ and SPD+ if the target gets knocked-out.

name: Protector
effect: When entering the battlefield, the ally gets DEF+ and SDPEF+.

name: Provident
effect: When attacked by a Fire, Earth, or Melee technique, increases SPDEF by 1 Stage.

name: Punching Bag
effect: Damage taken from  Melee techniques is reduced by 30%

name: Puppet Master
effect: While HP is below 40%, received rival techniques get redirected to the ally.

name: Pyromaniac
effect: +15% damage with  Fire techniques.

name: Receptive
effect: When getting a favorable status condition, increases its turns by 1.

name: Rejuvenate
effect: When attacking with a physcal technique, restore 15% of max HP.

name: Resilient
effect: Cannot be knocked-out due to overexertion.

name: Resistant
effect: When getting a negative status condition, decreases its turns by 1.

name: Rested
effect: Increases ATK and SPATK by 30% during the first 2 turns the Temtem is on the battlefield.

name: Scavenger
effect: Restores 15% of max HP if another Temtem is knocked-out.

name: Settling
effect: Increases ATK by 8% for each turn the Temtem stays on the battlefield.

name: Shared Pain
effect: When receiving a consecutive attack in the same turn, the technique gets redirected to the ally.

name: Soft Touch
effect: When attacking an Asleep  Status condition target, it won't wake up.

name: Spoilsport
effect: +25% damage with multi-target techniques.

name: Strong Liver
effect: When attacked with a Toxic techniques, restores HP instead of receiving damage.

name: Synergy Master
effect: Damage done with synergy techniques is increased by 25% while the Temtem participate in the synergy.

name: Thick Skin
effect: When attacked by a  Fire technique, reduces damage by 50%.

name: Tireless
effect: Prevents the overexertion turn penalization.

name: Toxic Affinity
effect: Toxic techniques get a damage boost of the same type.

name: Toxic Farewell
effect: When knocked-out, the attacker gets the  Poisoned  Status condition for 3 turns.

name: Toxic Skin
effect: When attacked with a physical technique, the attacker gets  Poisoned  Status condition for 2 turns.

name: Trance
effect: When attacked, gets  asleep  Status condition for 2 turns, SPATK +2 and SPDEF +2 if HP is below 30%.

name: Trauma
effect: Decreases DEF by 1 stage if hit by a physical technique, and decreases SPDEF by 1 stage if hit by a special technique.

name: Tri-Apothecary
effect: When attacking with a special technique, the target gets  poisoned  for 3 turns if it's a rival or  regenerating  for 3 turns if it's an ally.

name: Vigorous
effect: Damage done when overexerting is increased by 50%.

name: Warm-Blooded
effect: Prevents the   cold  Status condition.

name: Water Affinity
effect: Water techniques get a damage boost of the same type.

name: Withdrawal
effect: When resting, restores 15% of max HP and removes the asleep  Status condition.

name: Wrecked Farewell
effect: When kocked-out by overexting damage, every Temtem loses 25% of max HP.

name: Zen
effect: When getting the Asleep status condition, gets DEF +1 and SPDEF +1.
